ValidationRule.description: Users cannot add Recurring Partner Referral Fee and One Off Partner Referral Fee products to New Business or Upsell Opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
ISNEW(), Quantity >0, OR( TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "Existing Business-Upsell", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business - Expansion Portal" ), OR( Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo000001oQbRIAU', Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000mx1jAAA' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot add Recurring Partner Referral Fee and One Off Partner Referral Fee products to New business or Upsell opportunities.
